articles.title: Nevadans 16 and older eligible for COVID vaccine in April, Sisolak says - Las Vegas Review-Journal
articles.description: All Nevadans 16 and older will be eligible for a COVID-19 vaccine starting April 5, while those of the same age group with underlying conditions can get their shot as early as next week.
articles.content:
CARSON CITY — With vaccine production and availability accelerating across the country, Nevada will significantly expand who is eligible to receive a shot.
